attributes.action: Pass a law that cuts MPs wages to no more than the minimum wages ......
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NO expenses to be paid without receeipts (to the last  Penny) all minesterial cars to be disposed of, mps only allowed to use public transport. stop mps having 2nd home, buy a large hotel and all mps to use that, NO extra's allowed, No MP to have 2nd Job (Being an MP should be a full time Job), Mps not allowed to become Directors etc
Perhaps then they will be (more) in touch with the real world

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
